TEXT.TITLE: GRAIN RESERVE HOLDINGS BREAKDOWN
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Agriculture Department gave the following breakdown of grain remaining in the farmer-owned grain reserve as of April 1, in mln bushels, by reserve number -- I II III IV V VI Wheat nil nil 0.1 0.3 10.5 479.7 Corn -- -- -- 4.1 1,231.9 -- Sorghum-x -- -- -- 0.1 38.8 -- Barley -- -- -- 0.1 73.9 -- x - mln cwts. Note - USDA says above totals may not match total in reserve numbers. Reuter
